issuetype.name: New Feature

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.

components.name: Appcelerator Modules
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Modules here.

fields.description:
The release of the new Google Mobile Ads SDK (Android v20.0.0 and iOS v8.0.0) is planned for early 2021, and comes with a few major changes, as well as several straightforward API renames and removal of deprecated APIs.

Android: https://developers.google.com/admob/android/migration
iOS: https://developers.google.com/admob/ios/migration

It would be necessary to start preparing the ti.admob module for this migration
fields.summary: ti.admob: prepare for Android SDK v20 and iOS SDK v8

comments.body: Is there any chance that the module will be updated to support the new Google Mobile Ads SDK versions?
